Question
========
  
Which pair of contrasts are orthogonal to each other?

Contrast 1: ( +1  -1  +1  -1)

Contrast 2: (+1  +1   0   -2)

Contrast 3: (-1    0  +1   0)

Answerlist
----------
* Contrast 1 and 2
* Contrast 1 and 3 
* Contrast 2 and 3
* None of the contrast pairs.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
